30 (er, 20) Days to Success

December 12th, 2008 · 3 Comments

There are 20 more days in 2008.  You’ve been putting it off for too long so try something new every day for the next 20 days.  What are you going to do?

I’m giving up coffee and sweets and running every day.  Not much time left to get fit for the Big Day!

30 Days to Success.

FiveRuns

December 9th, 2008 · No Comments

Last week my employer, FiveRuns, laid off a significant amount of our employees. While most of the engineering team survived, other areas were not so lucky. Apparently the economy isn’t so hot these days. During this holiday season, please be thankful for what you have and remember those who aren’t so lucky.

Auto Bailouts

November 13th, 2008 · No Comments

1970s: Chrysler builds a ton of large cars with poor mileage. Gets hit hard when oil prices rise.
1979: Chrysler gets a bailout from the government.
2000s: Chrysler builds a ton of large cars with poor mileage. Gets hit hard when oil prices rise.
2009: Chrysler gets a bailout from the government?

Why are we bailing out “free market” companies when they continue to make the same mistakes?

→ No CommentsTags: General
